TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Query extends Microsoft.SharePoint.Client.ClientObject

Docs.summary: Contains information common to all types of search queries.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Microsoft.SharePoint.Client.ClientRuntimeContext context, class Microsoft.SharePoint.Client.ObjectPath objectPath) cil managed

Docs.summary: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int BlockDedupeMode { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Sets the de-duplication mode for result block ranking.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool BypassResultTypes { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the ResultTypes obtained from the search results should be used or overridden.

remarks.para: When the search engine returns search results, are returned accordingly. These are usually used to determine how the search results are displayed via their display templates. BypassResultTypes lets you override these display templates.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ClientType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Specifies the name of the client which issued the query.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Culture { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the locale for the query.
Docs.value: A object that specifies the locale ID.

remarks.para: The query engine uses the locale to interpret the query words, to determine which wordbreaker, stemmer, thesaurus, and other language-sensitive components to use.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int DesiredSnippetLength { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the preferred summary length.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableInterleaving { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: A Boolean value that specifies whether the objects in the produced by running this query should be interleaved.

remarks.para: We do not recommend modifying this property’s value unless you want to implement your own interleaving for your Search Application.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableNicknames { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the exact terms in the search query are used to find matches, or if nicknames are used as well.
Docs.value: true if nicknames are used; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableOrderingHitHighlightedProperty { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: A Boolean value that specifies whether the hit highlighted properties should be ordered by hit highlighted terms.
Docs.value: true if the highlighted properties are to be ordered by highlighted terms; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnablePhonetic { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the phonetic forms of the query terms are used to find matches.
Docs.value: true if phonetic forms are used; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableQueryRules { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: A Boolean value that specifies whether Query Rules are enabled for this query..

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableStemming { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether stemming is enabled.
Docs.value: true if stemming is enabled; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool GenerateBlockRankLog { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: A Boolean value that specifies whether to return information on the rank log for the result block via the BlockRankLog property of the interleaved result table.
Docs.value: true to return block rank log information in the BlockRankLog property of the interleaved result table; otherwise, false

remarks.para: If this property is set to true, the interleaved will have a BlockRankLog property in its ().

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.SharePoint.Client.ClientResult<Microsoft.SharePoint.Client.Search.Query.QuerySuggestionResults> GetQuerySuggestionsWithResults (int iNumberOfQuerySuggestions, int iNumberOfResultSuggestions, bool fPreQuerySuggestions, bool fHitHighlighting, bool fCapitalizeFirstLetters, bool fPrefixMatchAllTerms);

.method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.SharePoint.Client.ClientResult`1<class Microsoft.SharePoint.Client.Search.Query.QuerySuggestionResults> GetQuerySuggestionsWithResults(int32 iNumberOfQuerySuggestions, int32 iNumberOfResultSuggestions, bool fPreQuerySuggestions, bool fHitHighlighting, bool fCapitalizeFirstLetters, bool fPrefixMatchAllTerms) cil managed

Public Function GetQuerySuggestionsWithResults (iNumberOfQuerySuggestions As Integer, iNumberOfResultSuggestions As Integer, fPreQuerySuggestions As Boolean, fHitHighlighting As Boolean, fCapitalizeFirstLetters As Boolean, fPrefixMatchAllTerms As Boolean) As ClientResult(Of QuerySuggestionResults)

public: Microsoft::SharePoint::Client::ClientResult<Microsoft::SharePoint::Client::Search::Query::QuerySuggestionResults ^> ^ GetQuerySuggestionsWithResults(int iNumberOfQuerySuggestions, int iNumberOfResultSuggestions, bool fPreQuerySuggestions, bool fHitHighlighting, bool fCapitalizeFirstLetters, bool fPrefixMatchAllTerms);

Docs.param: Specifies the number of query suggestions the user would like to receive.
Specifies the maximum number of suggestions to return.
Specifies whether pre-query suggestions should be returned.
Specifies whether parts of the query suggestion returned should be hit-highlighted.
Specifies whether the first letter in the query suggestion should be capitalized.
Specifies if the suggestions returned should be prefix matched with the query text.
Docs.summary: Returns a list of query suggestions matching the search terms typed in the search box.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int HitHighlightedMultivaluePropertyLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the multi-valued hit highlighted property limit.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HitHighlightedProperties As StringCollection

Docs.summary: Gets the collection of hit highlighted properties for the query.
Docs.value: A collection of strings containing the hit highlighted properties.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IgnoreSafeQueryPropertiesTemplateUrl { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether the SafeQueryPropertiesTemplateUrl property should be ignored.
Docs.value: true when the permission is required; otherwise, false.

remarks.para: Setting this property to true will cause queries to fail for users who don’t have the permission, such as anonymous users.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ImpressionID { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the identifier (ID) of the page impression.

Docs.summary: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxSnippetLength { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Specifies the maximum length of the result summary.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::SharePoint::Client::Search::Query::QueryPersonalizationData ^ PersonalizationData { Microsoft::SharePoint::Client::Search::Query::QueryPersonalizationData ^ get(); void set(Microsoft::SharePoint::Client::Search::Query::QueryPersonalizationData ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the user personalization data for the current user who submitted the search query.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ProcessBestBets { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: A Boolean value that determines whether Best Bets are enabled.
Docs.value: true if the best bets are requested; otherwise, false

remarks.para: This property works in conjunction with . To enable Best Bets, must be true.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ProcessPersonalFavorites { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: A Boolean value that determines whether personal favorites data is processed or not.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ QueryTag { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets any custom tags to be used to identify the query. Multiple tags are separated by semicolons.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ QueryTemplate { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Specifies the query template that is used at run time to transform the query based on user input.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property QueryTemplateParameters As IDictionary(Of String, Boolean)
public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, bool> ^ QueryTemplateParameters { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, bool> ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Represents the parameters in the query template.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ QueryText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: The query text of the search query.
Docs.value: A string containing the query text.

remarks.para: When setting the QueryText property for the class, use Keyword Query Language (KQL).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ RankingModelId { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the identifier (ID) of the ranking model to use for the query.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ResultsUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the results page URL of the query.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int RowLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of rows returned in the search results, starting at the index specified by the property.
Docs.value: A 32-bit integer representing the maximum number of rows that will be returned in search results.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int RowsPerPage { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the number of search results to return per page.
Docs.value: A 32-bit integer specifying the number of search results

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SafeQueryPropertiesTemplateUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Specifies the location of the QueryProperties template. This property must be specified when issuing a query by a user who does not have permission enabled. If the query will not run without permission enabled, you can set the IgnoreSafeQueryPropertiesTemplateUrl property to true instead.

remarks.para: By default, is not granted to anonymous users.

The specified URL must use scheme "webpart" or "file". The host should be "webroot". For "webpart" URLs, the path must be web-relative path of the page on which the Web Part is placed. The query string of the URL must contain the key "id" with a value that contains a Web Part ID. For example: webpart://webroot/Pages/results.aspx?id=4. For "file" URLs, the path must be web-relative path of the file which contains the serialized QueryProperties template.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowPeopleNameSuggestions { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Specifies whether to generate name suggestions.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Guid SourceId { Guid get(); void set(Guid value); };

Docs.summary: Specifies the identifier (ID) of the result source to be used to run the query.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int StartRow { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the first row included in the search results.
Docs.value: A 32-bit integer representing the row index.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SummaryLength { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the length of the search result summary.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Timeout { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time, in milliseconds, before the query request times out.
Docs.value: A 32-bit integer representing the number of milliseconds

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int TotalRowsExactMinimum { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Used by the SearchPagingWebPart object to determine the minimum value required for rendering page links.
Docs.value: The minimum number of rows required for rendering page links.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool TrimDuplicates { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the search query should run if the query text contains only noise words.
Docs.value: true if search queries containing only noise words are not executed; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int UILanguage { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Specifies the UI language.

remarks.para: This property overrides the SPWeb site language from where the query is constructed.
